message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I know you'll find immense value in it. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. This is a starting point for our discussion, and I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $950,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While your offer is closer to what I had in mind, it's still a bit below the value I place on this product. To move things forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,050,000. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
